title: Tinoaly Birthday Number Candle, Red Sequins Firetruck Happy Birthday Candle Numeral Cake Topper for Boys Girls Firefighter Milestone Birthdays Anniversaries Firefighting Theme Party Gifts (Number 2)

Widely Used: Our shiny red number birthday candle can be used for milestone birthday parties, anniversary celebrations, firefighting theme parties, weddings, firefighter retirement parties, firetruck parties, theme parties, etc, to create a memorable and nice moment for your family, friends, or lovers.
